link:linkbase.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.xbrl.org/2003/linkbase http://www.xbrl.org/2003/xbrl-linkbase-2003-12-31.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/generic http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-link.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/boolean http://www.xbrl.org/2008/boolean-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/formula http://www.xbrl.org/2008/formula.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/consistency http://www.xbrl.org/2008/consistency-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/existence http://www.xbrl.org/2008/existence-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/assertion/value http://www.xbrl.org/2008/value-assertion.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/variable http://www.xbrl.org/2008/variable.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/period http://www.xbrl.org/2008/period-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/concept http://www.xbrl.org/2008/concept-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/tuple http://www.xbrl.org/2008/tuple-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/dimension http://www.xbrl.org/2008/dimension-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/general http://www.xbrl.org/2008/general-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/label http://www.xbrl.org/2008/generic-label.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/validation http://www.xbrl.org/2008/validation.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/unit http://www.xbrl.org/2008/unit-filter.xsd http://xbrl.org/2010/message http://www.xbrl.org/2010/generic-message.xsd http://xbrl.org/2008/filter/match http://www.xbrl.org/2008/match-filter.xsd

generic:link.msg:message: Identity "Value of Net Lease Income = (Gross Lease Income + Lease Equalisation)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Interest Income = (Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on Other Loans)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total investment income = (Interest + Dividends)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of fund based income = (Net Lease Income + Hire Purchase Income + Bills Discounting Income + Interest Income + Investment Income + Profit on Sale of Investments + Other fund-based income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Income from financial business = (Fund Based Income + Total Fee Based Income + Miscellaneous Income)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Income = (Total Income from Financial Business + Income from Non-Financial Business)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Interest Expense & Other Financing Cost = (Interest on Inter-corporate Deposits + Interest on credits from Banks + Interest on credits from Financial Institutions + Other Financing Charges)" do not tally.

Identity "Value of Total expenses = (Depreciation on Fixed Assets including Leased Assets + Interest Expense and other financing cost + Brokerage + Discount/charges on Bills rediscounted + Loss on Sale of Investments + Bad Debts written off + Provisions against Non-Performing Assets + Reversal of Income on NPAs + Diminution in value of investments + Operating Expenses + Expenses Relating to Non-Financial Business)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Profit before tax = (Total Income - Total expenses)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Net Profit/Loss = (Profit before Tax - Provision for taxation)" do not tally.
Values for all types of 'Reserves and Surplus' except for 'Revaluation Reserves' and 'Balance of Profit and Loss Account' should be positive.
Identity "Value of Total Operating expenses = (Employee costsc+ Other Administrative costs)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Total Credit to Real Estate = (Fund based exposure + Non fund based exposure)" do not tally.
Identity "Value of Provision for standard assets reported in Part 1 = (Provision held for Standard Assets reported in Part 3A)" do not tally.
Value of "Amount Outstanding" should be less than or equal to Rs 500 crore.
Value of "Amount Outstanding" should be less than or equal to Rs 500 crore.
Value of "Amount of loans & advances Outstanding" should be less than or equal to Rs 500 crore.
